github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text:
Generate a conventional commit message in the format type(scope): short description, where:

- type is one of: feat, fix, docs, chore, refactor, test, style, perf, remove
- scope describes the area or file changed (e.g. config, docker, main, server, middleware, proxy, build, etc.)
- short description is a concise sentence in imperative mood (e.g. add support for dark mode, fix error handler logic)

This project is a Go backend called echo-back used as a default backend for Ingress-NGINX.
Use precise and clean messages aligned with this structure.
